Funny how people are arguing all the time saying "it's R5! Not a DVDrip!". All this shit is while R5 is a >>DVD (!!!) of region 5

For the 522nd time; A R5 Rip is in fact a DVD Rip, how ever it's an *unofficial* DVD Rip, meaning that it isn't a rip from an *official* release but rather an *unofficial* resource.

Most R5 Rips have an alternative source for the audio as well, where as official releases do not.

So; Yes, R5 and DVD are the same thing, the only difference is that one is unofficial and the other is official and sometimes R5 will have less quality than an official rip, but there are R5 rips that can pass for official rips.

By the way; Good upload but a bad attitude.
